page.title: 06The College
page.content: Newton Park house was built about 1780, by a very rich man called Lord Temple. During later years other buildings were added to the house. During the war of l939 - 1945 it was temporarily converted into a hospital. In the later 1940s it became a college but its official opening was not until l952. It was a college to train students to be musicians and teachers. Initially, all the students were ladies. The College is now much bigger and has more students than ever before. The college is now called the Bath College of Higher Education Incorporating Bath Academy of Art. There are both male and female students studying a wide variety of subjects. The main subjects are now Education, Music,Art and Home Economics.
